bill.title: To designate the clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Mishawaka, Indiana, as the "Jackie Walorski VA Clinic".
bill.description: To designate the clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Mishawaka, Indiana, as the "Jackie Walorski VA Clinic".

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Mr. Takano asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR H7705)
On passage Passed without objection. (text: CR H7705)
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S4520)
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
